product_name: Merrell Mix Master Bound Sport Convertible Sandals - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Rugged and water-friendly, the Merrell Mix Master Bound Sport Convertible Sandals let you explore the shoreline or cross a stream on the trail without thinking twice about your feet. Synthetic leather uppers offer durable, flexible support; adjustable rip-and-stick closures at ankle and forefoot offer a secure fit and easy on/off. EVA midsoles offer all-day cushioning and support; textured, non-slip footbeds with Aegis(R) antimicrobial treatment resist odor. Durable rubber outsoles on the Merrell Mix Master Bound Sport Convertible Sandals offer great traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Rugged and water-friendly, the Merrell Mix Master Bound Sport Convertible Sandals let you explore the shoreline or cross a stream on the trail without thinking twice about your feet.
